name: Las Vegas Dream 2
overview: Las Vegas Dream 2 is a casino game simulation game with 2 main game modes: - Virtual Mode: Sort of a storty mode in which the player takes the role of an alien gambler that travels to Earth and visit the Galaxy Hotel in Las Vegas and will try to become millionaire playing 6 different casino games: Poker, Blackjack, Roulette, Slot Machine, Craps & Keno. - Multiplay mode: Play against another human player (up to 4 human players). In this mode only Blackjack, Roulette & Craps can be played).
